title: How to Add Contacts from an Email Account to an iPhone

steps.title: This is the gray cogs icon on your Home screen.
steps.content: This is the gray cogs icon on your Home screen. If you donâ€™t see it on your home screen, check in a folder called "Utilities."

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Mail.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Mail . You can find it in the fifth section of items.

steps.title: Tap Accounts to view all of the email addresses on your device.
steps.content: Tap Accounts to view all of the email addresses on your device. This includes your iCloud email address and any other accounts you've added.

steps.title: Some common account types include iCloud, Gmail, and Outlook.
steps.content: Some common account types include iCloud, Gmail, and Outlook. After selecting one of the options, a new page will open with several on/off choices.

steps.title: When the Contacts switch is On, your contacts will sync to your iPhone.
steps.content: When the Contacts switch is On, your contacts will sync to your iPhone. Now, anyone you have saved to this email address book will also appear in your iPhone contacts list.
